name: Meteor Dodger (hnm938)
description:
This game started off as a little school project where I had to make a game using scratch. I went home and thought about it and I said to myself "I can do better" so within a week I tried to recreate my school project scratch game using unity with retro styled graphics and mostly a retro feel, this project was just for fun and a way to challenge my self to stick to a project.

If the game is buggy please tell me.
